mapper.sql: select is_rate,id, dj_number, store_code, dj_time, store_name, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, file_name from cg_rkd

select a.*,case a.status when 0 then '正操作' when 1 then '已提交' end as dj_status_name, (select sum(goods_num) from cg_rkd_child where dj_number=a.dj_number) as sum_num from cg_rkd a join sys_user u on a.create_by=u.user_name left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
mapper.select: select (select count(DISTINCT a.id) from cg_rkd a join cg_rkd_child b on a.dj_number=b.dj_number left join owner_info c on b.person_code=c.owner_code where a.create_by=#{createBy} and b.status=1 ) + (select count(DISTINCT a.id) from cg_rkd_single a where a.create_by=#{createBy} and a.status=2 )

select.if:
select DISTINCT 1 as type,b.id,a.dj_number,a.create_time,b.person_code,b.person_name, case b.status when 0 then '未接收' when -1 then '已拒绝' when -2 then '被退回' when 1 then '已接收' when 2 then '已审核' end as status_name from cg_rkd a join cg_rkd_child b on a.dj_number=b.dj_number left join owner_info c on b.person_code=c.owner_code where a.create_by=#{createBy}
and (b.status=1||b.status=2||b.status=-2) or (a.`status`=2||a.`status`=3||a.`status`=-2)
and b.status=1
and b.status=2
and b.status=-2
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

select DISTINCT 0 as type,a.id,a.dj_number,a.create_time,a.person_code,a.person_name, case a.status when 1 then '未接收' when -1 then '已拒绝' when -2 then '被退回' when 2 then '已接收' when 3 then '已审核' end as status_name from cg_rkd_single a where a.create_by=#{createBy}
and (a.`status`>=2||a.`status` <=-2)
and a.status=2
and a.status=3
and a.status=-2
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

mapper.select:
select distinct 1 as type,b.id,a.dj_number,a.create_time,a.create_by as person_code, case b.status when 0 then '未接收' when -1 then '已拒绝' when -2 then '被退回' when 1 then '已接收' when 2 then '已审核' end as status_name, (select distinct nick_name from sys_user where user_name=a.create_by) as person_name, (select distinct unit_name from sys_user where user_name=a.create_by) as person_lxr from cg_rkd a join cg_rkd_child b on a.dj_number=b.dj_number left join owner_info c on b.person_code=c.owner_code where b.person_code=#{createBy}
and b.status=0 and a.`status`=1
and (b.status=1||b.status=2||b.status=-1||b.status=-2) or (a.`status`=2||a.`status`=3||a.`status`=-1||a.`status`=-2)
UNION ALL select distinct 0 as type,a.id,a.dj_number,a.create_time, a.create_by as person_code, case a.status when 1 then '未接收' when -1 then '已拒绝' when -2 then '被退回' when 2 then '已接收' when 3 then '已审核' end as status_name, (select distinct nick_name from sys_user where user_name=a.create_by) as person_name, (select distinct unit_name from sys_user where user_name=a.create_by) as person_lxr from cg_rkd_single a join cg_rkd_single_child b on a.dj_number=b.dj_number left join owner_info c on a.person_code=c.owner_code where a.person_code=#{createBy}
and a.`status`=1
and (a.`status`>=2||a.`status` <=-1)
ORDER BY create_time DESC

select
(select count(id) from owner_info) as djStatusName,
(select count(id) from goods_info_owner where create_by in(select owner_code from owner_info)) as goodsName,
(select (select count(id) from cg_rkd where create_by in(select owner_code from owner_info))+ (select count(id) from cg_rkd_single where create_by in(select owner_code from owner_info)))as createName,
(select count(id) from goods_info_owner where create_by in(select owner_code from owner_info) and goods_address is not null) as personName
select IFNULL((select count(id) from cg_rkd_child where dj_number=#{djNumber}),0)-IFNULL((select count(id) from cg_rkd_child where dj_number=#{djNumber} and status=1),0)
select IFNULL((select count(id) from cg_rkd_child where dj_number=#{djNumber}),0)-IFNULL((select count(id) from cg_rkd_child where dj_number=#{djNumber} and status=2),0)
